name: St John Ambulance Large Standard Workplace First Aid Kit
description:
Large first aid kit for the workplace
Conforms with British Standard BS 8599-1:2019
For a working environment for up to 100 people
Fully stocked with first aid supplies
Supplied with wall bracket

name: Box of 100 St John Ambulance Vinyl Powder-Free Gloves
description:
Ideal for low-risk, short term procedures
St John Ambulance branded 
Powder-free
Ambidextrous
Latex-free.

name: Semi-Automatic Defibrillator
description:
Semi-automatic defibrillator (AED) for treatment of Sudden Cardiac Arrest (SCA)
Clear, calm guidance for those with no first aid experience and emergency professionals
Lid can be placed under the shoulders of the patient to help keep the airway open
Can be used on children up to 8 using Pedi Padz II Electrodes
CPR-D padz have a shelf life of five years.

name: Type 1 Disposable Surgical Face Masks
description:
Pack of 50 Type 1 face masks
3-ply disposable surgical face mask
Soft and comfortable fitting with ear loops and easy breathability
Conforms to EN 14683:2019
Bacterial filtration efficiency (BFE) >95%
